title.rendered: ADU8712-E-V3 Uniview 12 Channel High Definition Video Decoder

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]

  • Provides 12 HDMI output interfaces
  • Supports 2 DVI-D and 2 HDMI input interfaces
  • Up to 3840×2160@30Hz via HDMI output interfaces
  • Up to 3840×2160@30Hz via HDMI input interfaces
  • Single port decoding capability up to 16*1080P@30
  • Up to decoding at 12MP resolution
  • Supports window opening, roaming and picture in picture
  • Multicast Supported
  • Support for virtual LED
  • Fine Pixel LED display
  • Decode video stream in H.265/ H.264/MPEG4
  • Support up 12 video-wall display units
  • Support local upgrade and remote upgrade

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]

Download Product Description

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: The ADU8712-E-V3 is a 12 Channel Video Decoder from Uniview. If your application requires additional monitors or a video wall, you can use a Decoder to accomplish this. Decoded Video can be displayed on a Video Wall, or large screen, or a combination of both.
